name: Customer Service Email
sourceText:
Dear customer,

We have processed your refund request. The amount will be credited to your account within 5-7 business days.

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us.

Best regards,
Customer Support Team
targetText:
Estimado cliente,

Hemos procesado su solicitud de reembolso. La cantidad será acreditada a su cuenta dentro de 5-7 días de negocio.

Si tienes cualquier pregunta, por favor no dudes en contactarnos.

Saludos,
Equipo de Soporte al Cliente

errors.note: In financial contexts in Spain, "importe" is more appropriate than "cantidad".
Direct translation from English "business days". In Spanish (Spain), the correct term is "días laborables" or "días hábiles"
While technically correct, "devolución" is more commonly used in Spanish (Spain) for customer service contexts.
Passive voice calque from English. More natural: "se abonará en su cuenta".
Inconsistent register. Started with formal "usted" (su) but switched to informal "tú" (tienes). Should be "tiene".
In Spain, "Atención al Cliente" is the standard term, not "Soporte al Cliente".
Too informal for this context. Better: "Reciba un cordial saludo" or "Atentamente".
